Texto: 
none
rounded, macroscopic-fat containing mass incidentally noted involving the left adrenal gland. no aggressive features.
adrenal myelolipoma
none, identification of fat density is diagnostic
45y/o male with abdominal pain and ct ordered for r/o appendicitis.
